about_the_game:
Embark on a delectable journey in "The CakeMan"! Play as the charming and cake-loving Cakeman in a whimsical world filled with delightful challenges.

🍰 Build the Tallest Cake Tower:
Explore vibrant landscapes and gather scrumptious cake pieces scattered throughout each level. Strategically stack them on Cakeman's head to build the tallest cake tower ever seen!

🍭 Face Sweet Challenges:
Navigate through candy forests, magical bakeries, and dessert islands, all while overcoming challenging obstacles. Beware of mischievous creatures and tricky jumps that could topple your towering creation.

⏰ Race Against Time:
Time is of the essence! Collect as many cake pieces as you can before the clock runs out. Will you be the ultimate cake architect and reach towering heights?

🎮 Multiplayer Mayhem:
Challenge friends or compete against players worldwide in a multiplayer mode. Who can create the most legendary cake tower within the time limit? The sweetest rivalry awaits!

🚀 Power-Up Pandemonium:
Discover exciting power-ups that temporarily stabilize your cake tower or grant special abilities. Cake shields and more add a dash of chaos and excitement to your stacking adventure!

🏆 Customize and Conquer:
Personalize your Cakeman with various outfits, cake toppers, and more as you level up. Unlock new maps, characters, and power-ups to keep the sweetness flowing.

Get ready for a sugary spectacle as you embark on the ultimate cake-stacking quest. "The CakeMan" is a whimsical blend of precision, strategy, and delicious fun. Let the stacking begin!

name: The Cakeman

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 | AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7750 | NVIDIA Geforce GTX 260
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: Indulge in "The CakeMan" — a whimsical journey where you, as Cakeman, stack scrumptious cake pieces to reach towering heights. Navigate sweet landscapes, conquer challenges, and race against time. Unleash multiplayer mayhem. Ready for the ultimate cake-stacking delight?
